Serialized Form

Package drawpad

Class drawpad.DrawPad implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

openDrawPad

OpenDrawPad openDrawPad
A reference to the OpenDrawPad instance that created this instance

lastClick

long lastClick
Records the time of the last click

clearPad

boolean clearPad
Flag indicating if the pad should be cleared

dragged

boolean dragged
Flag indicating if the cursor is being dragged

lastPt

java.awt.Point lastPt
The coords of the last printed points

firstPt

java.awt.Point firstPt
The coords of the first click in a possible double click. Set to * (-20, -20) to avoid having the user being able to draw a line * before clicking at least 3 times on the pad. (-20, -20) will never * be a valid point.

points

java.util.Vector points
List of all the coordinates
